name: GCVirtualController
desc: A software emulation of a real controller that you configure specifically for your game.

items.name: init(configuration: GCVirtualController.Configuration)
items.desc: Creates a new virtual controller using the configuration you specify.

items.name: class GCVirtualController.Configuration
items.desc: The configuration of a virtual controller.

items.name: func updateConfiguration(forElement: String, configuration: (GCVirtualController.ElementConfiguration) -> GCVirtualController.ElementConfiguration)
items.desc: Changes the configuration for one of the virtual controller’s input elements.

items.name: class GCVirtualController.ElementConfiguration
items.desc: The properties of a virtual controller’s element that you can customize.

items.name: func connect(replyHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Connects the virtual controller to the device and displays it on the screen.

items.name: func disconnect()
items.desc: Disconnects the virtual controller from the device and removes it from the screen.

items.name: var controller: GCController?
items.desc: The underlying controller object that you use to access input elements.
